name: ALBANIANS FOR AMERICA
description: Organization advocating for issues of importance to Albanian Americans.
sampleDescriptions: Issues of importance to Albanian Americans including the independence of Kosovo, stronger economic ties between the United States and Albanian interests across the Balkans, and human rights issues.
